S

SCIClient - Class in com.sitemorse.sci
Implement the Sitemorse CMS Integration (SCI) Client protocol.
SCIClient(String) - Constructor for class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Construct an SCIClient object with the specified licence key, and default connection parameters.
SCIClient(String, String) - Constructor for class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Construct an SCIClient object with the specified licence key, using the specified host name to connect to the SCI server.
SCIClient(String, String, int) - Constructor for class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Construct an SCIClient object with the specified licence key, using the specified host name and port to connect to the SCI server.
SCIClient(String, String, int, boolean) - Constructor for class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Construct an SCIClient object with the specified licence key, using the specified host name and port to connect to the SCI server, and setting whether or not to use SSL to connect.
SCIException - Exception in com.sitemorse.sci
All exceptions thrown by SCIClient are subclasses of this exception.
SCIServerError - Exception in com.sitemorse.sci
A subclass of SCIException that is thrown when the server sends a specific error message that must be displayed to the user.
setExtraHeaders(String[]) - Method in class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Sets extra HTTP headers to send with each request that is proxied through this class.
setExtraQuery(String) - Method in class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Sets an extra query string to be sent with each request that is proxied through this class.
setPostAllowed(boolean) - Method in class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Set whether or not HTTP POSTs are allowed to be proxied through us.
setSciProxyHostname(String) - Method in class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Set the host name of the HTTP proxy server to tunnel the SCI connection through.
setSciProxyPort(int) - Method in class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Set the TCP port number of the HTTP proxy server to tunnel the SCI connection through.
setServerHostname(String) - Method in class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Set the host name of the SCI server.
setServerPort(int) - Method in class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Set the TCP port number used when connecting to the SCI server.
setServerSecure(boolean) - Method in class com.sitemorse.sci.SCIClient
Set whether or not the connection to the SCI server should use SSL.
